Description: Ear-stud or bead of papyrus form: the body is of translucent dark-blue glass, matt surface. The marvered spiral on the shaft is formed from a slender, opaque white thread. A yellow thread encircles the base of the shaft and the circumference of the disc.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Sale Catalogue, Henry Salt Collection, Sotheby, London, 28 June – 8 July 1835, lot 472.
